did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.unittitle: Minutes of the John Bowie Strange Camp of Confederate Veterans, 1889-1910
did.origination: John Bowie Strange Camp of the United Confederate Veterans

accessrestrict.head: Access Restrictions
accessrestrict.p: The collection is open for research.

userestrict.head: Use Restrictions
userestrict.p: Researchers must use the photograph copies of the originial.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Minutes of the John Bowie Strange Camp of Confederate Veterans, MS 489, Albemarle Charlottesville Historical Society, Charlottesville, Virginia

bioghist.head: Historical Information
bioghist.p: The John Bowie Strange Camp of the United Confederate Veterans was organized at the Albemarle County, Virginia courthouse on 22 August 1889.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: This collection contains the meeting minutes of the John Bowie Strange Camp from 1889 to 1910. The first entry is dated 6 August 1889. The last entry is 27 June 1910.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: This collection includes the original bound volume of meeting minutes, 241p., plus 2 photocopied volumes of the minutes. Photocopy volume 1 covers pages 1-132, photocopy volume 2 covers pages 133-241 of the original minute book.
